column5: Knowing the quality of service provide by Air Tamarac; I think it should be something to look at: https://www.tamarac.ca/far-north-exp...nd-fishing.php
That would be a trip for a lifetime.
Any idea what the rates are? Also, what kind of fish is a "wendigo"? Googling suggests it's a splake, but it would seem odd that there would be hatchery fish way up there.
Just click on website from andre. I have been twice and am booked for July 2019 and 2020. 5 stars the best of he best
The website doesn't list the rates, or explain what a wendigo is. Can you provide details?
Looks like an awesome experience,and with the care air Tamarac puts into their operation should be top notch!It's going on my bucket list for sure.
